allow: Bash(cmd.exe /c "conda activate ai_think_tank && python -c ""from agents.personas import PERSONAS; print\(len\(PERSONAS\), ''personas loaded''\)""")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "conda activate ai_think_tank; python -c ''from agents.personas import PERSONAS; print\(len\(PERSONAS\), chr\(39\) + ""personas loaded"" + chr\(39\)\)''")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "conda activate ai_think_tank; python -c ''from agents.personas import PERSONAS; assert all\(""system_prompt"" in p for p in PERSONAS.values\(\)\); print\(""all prompts ok""\)''")
